title: Custom Skins
body: I was wondering, if custom skins are allowed?

replies.body: Custom Skins generally sit in a "use-at-your-own-risk" category, since there's no telling what other types of programs are attached to them. I'd err on the side of being safe and not using them. You run the risk of a script being attached to the custom skins which could end up getting you hit with a scripting punishment.
